title: Candidate background
text: Full-stack developer with focus on TypeScript/JavaScript. Strengths in React, Next.js, Node.js/Express, and Chrome extensions. Experience with WebSockets, real-time audio streaming, and LLM integrations. Familiar with testing (Jest) and cloud basics. Comfortable optimizing performance and debugging complex browser issues.

title: Google Meet assistant project
text: Built a Chrome extension that captures Google Meet audio, streams it to AssemblyAI for real-time transcription, and will route transcripts to GPT for replies. Uses Manifest V3 service worker, offscreen document for audio capture, AudioWorklet for processing, and a backend token proxy. Handles buffering to meet API chunk requirements and robust logging for debugging.

title: Real-time communication work
text: Implemented real-time features with WebRTC/WebSockets, including audio processing pipelines, buffering, and latency-sensitive messaging. Comfortable handling binary audio formats (PCM s16le), gain control, and chunk sizing for streaming APIs.

title: Interview preparation notes
text: Focus on concise, confident answers. Highlight strengths in debugging, real-time systems, and quick prototyping. Mention ability to integrate LLMs with streaming inputs and build reliable Chrome extensions for productivity.
